invoice.description: The invoice you want to create

id.description: The invoice id. Required if you want to create or update an invoice position for an existing invoice

contact.description: The contact used in the invoice

sevClient.description: Client to which invoice belongs. Will be filled automatically

invoiceDate.description: Needs to be provided as timestamp or dd.mm.yyyy

header.description: Normally consist of prefix plus the invoice number

headText.description: Certain html tags can be used here to format your text

footText.description: Certain html tags can be used here to format your text

timeToPay.description: The time the customer has to pay the invoice in days

discountTime.description:
If a value other than zero is used for the discount attribute,
    you need to specify the amount of days for which the discount is granted.

discount.description: If you want to give a discount, define the percentage here. Otherwise provide zero as value

addressCountry.description: Can be omitted as complete address is defined in address attribute

payDate.description: Needs to be timestamp or dd.mm.yyyy

createUser.description: Will be filled automatically by our system and can't be changed

deliveryDate.description: Timestamp. This can also be a date range if you also use the attribute deliveryDateUntil

status.description: Please have a look in our Types and status of invoices to see what the different status codes mean

smallSettlement.description:
Defines if the client uses the small settlement scheme.
    If yes, the invoice must not contain any vat

contactPerson.description: The user who acts as a contact person for the invoice

taxRate.description: Is overwritten by invoice position tax rates

taxText.description: A common tax text would be 'Umsatzsteuer 19%'

dunningLevel.description:
Defines how many reminders have already been sent for the invoice.
    Starts with 1 (Payment reminder) and should be incremented by one every time another reminder is sent.

taxType.description:
Tax type of the invoice.
There are four tax types:
1. default - Umsatzsteuer ausweisen
2. eu - Steuerfreie innergemeinschaftliche Lieferung (Europäische Union)
3. noteu - Steuerschuldnerschaft des Leistungsempfängers (außerhalb EU, z. B. Schweiz)
4. custom - Using custom tax set
Tax rates are heavily connected to the tax type used.

paymentMethod.description: Payment method used for the invoice

id.description: Unique identifier of the payment method
Unique identifier of the cost centre

sendDate.description: The date the invoice was sent to the customer

origin.description: Origin of the invoice. Could f.e. be an order

invoiceType.description: Type of the invoice. For more information on the different types, check this section

accountIntervall.description:
The interval in which recurring invoices are due as ISO-8601 duration.
Necessary attribute for all recurring invoices.

accountNextInvoice.description: Timestamp when the next invoice will be generated by this recurring invoice.

reminderDeadline.description: Deadline of the reminder as timestamp

taxSet.description: Tax set of the invoice. Needs to be added if you chose the tax type custom

address.description:
Complete address of the recipient including name, street, city, zip and country.
     * Line breaks can be used and will be displayed on the invoice pdf.

currency.description: Currency used in the invoice. Needs to be currency code according to ISO-4217

sumDiscounts.description: Sum of all discounts in the invoice

sumNetForeignCurrency.description: Net sum of the invoice in the foreign currency

sumTaxForeignCurrency.description: Tax sum of the invoice in the foreign currency

sumGrossForeignCurrency.description: Gross sum of the invoice in the foreign currency

sumDiscountsForeignCurrency.description: Discounts sum of the invoice in the foreign currency

sumNetAccounting.description: Net accounting sum of the invoice. Is usually the same as sumNet

sumTaxAccounting.description: Tax accounting sum of the invoice. Is usually the same as sumTax

sumGrossAccounting.description: Gross accounting sum of the invoice. Is usually the same as sumGross

paidAmount.description: Amount which has already been paid for this invoice by the customer

customerInternalNote.description: Internal note of the customer. Contains data entered into field 'Referenz/Bestellnummer'

showNet.description: If true, the net amount of each position will be shown on the invoice. Otherwise gross amount

enshrined.description: Defines if and when invoice was enshrined. Enshrined invoices can not be manipulated.

sendType.description:
Type which was used to send the invoice. IMPORTANT: Please refer to the invoice section of the
     *     API-Overview to understand how this attribute can be used before using it!

deliveryDateUntil.description:
If the delivery date should be a time range, another timestamp can be provided in this attribute
     * to define a range from timestamp used in deliveryDate attribute to the timestamp used here.

invoicePosSave.description: The invoice positions you want to create. If you don't have any, set to null.

id.description: The invoice position id. Required if you want to update an invoice position for an existing invoice

update.description: Date of last invoice position update

invoice.description: The invoice to which the position belongs.

part.description: Part from your inventory which is used in the position.

price.description: Price of the article/part. Is either gross or net, depending on the sevDesk account setting.

unity.description: The unit in which the positions part is measured

sevClient.description: Client to which invoice position belongs. Will be filled automatically

positionNumber.description: Position number of your position. Can be used to order multiple positions.

discount.description: An optional discount of the position.

sumNetAccounting.description: Net accounting sum of the position

sumTaxAccounting.description: Tax accounting sum of the position

sumGrossAccounting.description: Gross accounting sum of the position

priceTax.description: Tax on the price of the part

invoicePosDelete.description: The invoice positions you want to delete. If you don't have any, set to null.

discountSave.description: The discounts you want to create. If you don't have any, set to null.

discount.description: Defines if this is a discount or a surcharge

percentage.description: Defines if this is a percentage or an absolute discount

discountDelete.description: The discounts you want to delete. If you don't have any, set to null.

takeDefaultAddress.description: Defines if the address of the supplied contact is automatically filled into the invoice.
